verses.verse: Wine <WH3196> is a mocker<WH3887>, strong drink<WH7941> a brawler<WH1993>; And whosoever erreth<WH7686> thereby is not wise<WH2449>.
The terror<WH367> of a king<WH4428> is as the roaring<WH5099> of a lion<WH3715>: He that provoketh him to anger<WH5674> sinneth<WH2398> against his own life<WH5315>.
It is an honor<WH3519> for a man<WH376> to keep aloof from strife<WH7379>; But every fool<WH191> will be quarrelling<WH1566>.
The sluggard<WH6102> will not plow<WH2790> by reason of the winter<WH2779>; Therefore he shall beg<WH7592> in harvest<WH7105>, and have nothing.
Counsel <WH6098> in the heart<WH3820> of man<WH376> is like deep<WH6013> water<WH4325>; But a man<WH376> of understanding<WH8394> will draw it out<WH1802>.
Most <WH7230> men<WH120> will proclaim<WH7121> every one<WH376> his own kindness<WH2617>; But a faithful<WH529> man<WH376> who can find<WH4672>?
A righteous<WH6662> man that walketh<WH1980> in his integrity<WH8537>, Blessed<WH835> are his children<WH1121> after him<WH310>.
A king<WH4428> that sitteth on<WH3427> the throne<WH3678> of judgment<WH1779> Scattereth away<WH2219> all evil<WH7451> with his eyes<WH5869>.
Who can say<WH559>, I have made my heart<WH3820> clean<WH2135>, I am pure<WH2891> from my sin<WH2403>?
Diverse weights<WH68>, and diverse measures<WH374>, Both<WH8147> of them alike<WH1571> are an abomination<WH8441> to Jehovah<WH3068>.
Even a child<WH5288> maketh himself known<WH5234> by his doings<WH4611>, Whether his work<WH6467> be pure<WH2134>, and whether it be right<WH3477>.
The hearing<WH8085> ear<WH241>, and the seeing<WH7200> eye<WH5869>, Jehovah<WH3068> hath made<WH6213> even both of them<WH8147>.
Love <WH157> not sleep<WH8142>, let thou come to poverty<WH3423>; Open<WH6491> thine eyes<WH5869>, and thou shalt be satisfied<WH7646> with bread<WH3899>.
It is bad<WH7451>, it is bad<WH7451>, saith<WH559> the buyer<WH7069>; But when he is gone<WH235> his way<WH1984>, then he boasteth.
There is<WH3426> gold<WH2091>, and abundance<WH7230> of rubies<WH6443>; But the lips<WH8193> of knowledge<WH1847> are a precious<WH3366> jewel<WH3627>.
Take <WH3947> his garment<WH899> that is surety<WH6148> for a stranger<WH2114>; And hold him in pledge<WH2254> that is surety for foreigners<WH5237>.
Bread <WH3899> of falsehood<WH8267> is sweet<WH6156> to a man<WH376>; But afterwards<WH310> his mouth<WH6310> shall be filled<WH4390> with gravel<WH2687>.
Every purpose<WH4284> is established<WH3559> by counsel<WH6098>; And by wise guidance<WH8458> make<WH6213> thou war<WH4421>.
He that goeth about<WH1980> as a tale-bearer<WH7400> revealeth<WH1540> secrets<WH5475>; Therefore company<WH6148> not with him that openeth<WH6601> wide his lips<WH8193>.
Whoso curseth<WH7043> his father<WH1> or his mother<WH517>, His lamp<WH5216> shall be put out<WH1846> in blackness<WH380> of darkness<WH2822>.
An inheritance<WH5159> may be gotten hastily<WH926> at the beginning<WH7223>; But the end<WH319> thereof shall not be blessed<WH1288>.
Say <WH559> not thou<WH7999>, I will recompense evil<WH7451>: Wait for<WH6960> Jehovah<WH3068>, and he will save thee<WH3467>.
Diverse weights<WH68> are an abomination<WH8441> to Jehovah<WH3068>; And a false<WH4820> balance<WH3976> is not good<WH2896>.
A man<WH1397>'s goings<WH4703> are of Jehovah<WH3068>; How then can man<WH120> understand<WH995> his way<WH1870>?
It is a snare<WH4170> to a man<WH120> rashly<WH3216> to say<WH6944>, It is holy, And after<WH310> vows<WH5088> to make inquiry<WH1239>.
A wise<WH2450> king<WH4428> winnoweth<WH2219> the wicked<WH7563>, And bringeth<WH7725> the threshing<WH212> -wheel over them.
The spirit<WH5397> of man<WH120> is the lamp<WH5216> of Jehovah<WH3068>, Searching<WH2664> all his innermost<WH2315> parts<WH2315>.
Kindness <WH2617> and truth<WH571> preserve<WH5341> the king<WH4428>; And his throne<WH3678> is upholden<WH5582> by kindness<WH2617>.
The glory<WH8597> of young men<WH970> is their strength<WH3581>; And the beauty<WH1926> of old men<WH2205> is the hoary head<WH7872>.
Stripes <WH2250> that wound<WH6482> cleanse<WH8562> away evil<WH7451>; And strokes<WH4347> reach the innermost<WH2315> parts<WH2315>.
